DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , observational , non-interventional , retrospective analysis chart review .
DOC.brief_title: Study Immunosuppressive Therapy Toxicities Kidney Transplant Recipients Regional Satellite Community Clinics
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare difference patient graft relate outcome renal transplant recipient follow regional transplant center versus satellite clinic .
DOC.criteria: Patient least 18 month post transplant Patient current transplant period 1 July 1997 less 18 month prior chart review Patient currently tacrolimus/MMF AZA cyclosporine/MMF AZA base immunosuppressive therapy Patient recipient dual kidney multi organ transplant Patient functioning graft ( i.e . patient require dialysis ) Patient recipient renal transplant include live cadaveric , relate nonrelated , pediatric en bloc kidney , exclude kidneypancreas transplant recipient Patient receive current transplant one six identified regional transplant center Patient currently follow regional satellite community base nephrology clinic
